title: Workorder: Define core entities (Estimate, WorkOrder, Invoice, Warranty)
body: Define Moqui entities and relationships for all major work execution objects.

title: Workorder: Validate state machines
body: Align Draft→Approved→InProgress→Completed→Invoiced transitions with domain rules.

title: Workorder: Implement Estimate creation service
body: CreateEstimate service in Moqui including validation and pricing hooks.

body: Implement transition with initial WorkOrderItem creation.

body: AddItem, RemoveItem services; ensure pricing and inventory linking.

body: Experience-layer orchestration for initial estimate creation.

body: Expose full DTO for UI and MCP.

body: Complete service including validations and mechanic steps.

body: Orchestration across Product, Inventory, and Accounting.

body: Call Inventory experience API to reserve parts.

body: Call Product pricing API to populate Estimate.

body: Handle mechanic, bay, mobile unit assignments.

body: ERS request entity + Positivity stub requests.

body: Define MCP actions: Create Estimate, Add Item, Summarize WO.
